info.title: Proxy Smart Backend
info.description: SMART on FHIR Proxy + Healthcare Administration API using Keycloak and Elysia

tags.name: ai
tags.description: AI assistant endpoints proxied to MCP server

BearerAuth.description: JWT Bearer token from OAuth2 flow

OAuth2.description: OAuth2 authentication via Keycloak with SMART on FHIR support

scopes.user/*.read: Read all data for current user
scopes.user/*.write: Write all data for current user

scopes.system/*.read: System-level read access to FHIR resources
scopes.system/*.write: System-level write access to FHIR resources

MutualTLS.description: Mutual TLS authentication for secure API communication between proxy and FHIR servers. Submit a request to the infrastructure team with full information about your application to obtain a client certificate.

get.description: Fast liveness/readiness probe. Use /status for detailed system information.
Comprehensive system status (cached components)

get.description: Get current OAuth analytics and metrics

topClients.description: Top OAuth clients by request count

generatedAt.description: Timestamp when the prediction was generated

totalFlows.description: Predicted total OAuth flows for the next hour

successRate.description: Predicted success rate percentage for the next hour

errorRate.description: Predicted error rate percentage for the next hour

items.description: Drivers that influenced the risk score

weekday.description: Day of the week (0-6, Sunday based on UTC)

sampleDays.description: Number of observed days contributing to this insight

averageTotal.description: Average total flows for the weekday

averageSuccessRate.description: Average success rate percentage for the weekday

averageErrorRate.description: Average error rate percentage for the weekday

projectedTotal.description: Projected total flows for the next occurrence

projectedSuccessRate.description: Projected success rate percentage for the next occurrence

projectedErrorRate.description: Projected error rate percentage for the next occurrence

latestTotal.description: Most recent total flow count observed

deltaFromAverage.description: Percentage delta from the weekday average

lastObserved.description: Timestamp of the most recent observation
